page.title: 14Manor Farm Stud
page.content: This used to be for{cart horses,}so the stalls are large and the doors are high. It is not used for stud so much now, but racehorses (thoroughbreds) of all ages are stabled there. The owner trains the horses for racing. At the moment there 28 horses and one colt at farm. They originally had 4 horses. The stables have been there since {1953.} The present owner has been here 9 years. The horses come from all over {England and Ireland.} The smallest is 14 hh and the biggest is 17 hh (1hh =10cm). There are no stallions on the farm; only mares are used for{point {to point races.} The oldest horse is 16 years old. One of the horses, an American thoroughbred, cost $300,000. The owner has to have a passport for each horse to race. They have five grooms and their racing colours are cherry and white.
